EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-09-19 Reserved Instances AWS Webinar.ES-2018-09-13 Reserved Instances A
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Demo: RI Optimization in AWS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/reserved-instances-aws/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
By investing in AWS Reserved Instances you have the best intentions to shrink your cloud bill, but then you don't use what you've paid for and the guilt sets in - like that unused gym membership. It doesn't have to be this way; we have your back.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/reserved-instances-aws/]]>
Join this live demo on September 19 at 11 a.m. ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/reserved-instances-aws/]]> to see how software can accurately and continuously apply RIs, so you get all the cost benefits and none of the guilt with Turbonomic RI optimization in AWS.
Regards, Megan
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/reserved-instances-aws/]]>, and we'll send you the recording afterward.
